column4: What apps does this guy have in his screenshot?? The ones that show his CPU usage and mediaplayer and such ... ? http://gnome-look.org/content/preview.php?preview=1&id=95885&file1=95885-1.jpg&file2=95885-2.jpg&file3=95885-3.jpg&name=Yakano+-Colors-
It's called conky, and is in the 'conky' package. I don't know how to configure it, though.
Right-click it in the file manager -> Properties -> Permissions -> check the Execute box
